snippet: President Vladimir V. Putin’s press secretary said that Mr. Putin had been working from home lately rather than commuting to the Kremlin to avoid causing traffic congestion.
abstract: Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin's press secretary denies rumors about Putin's health that have arisen after series of changes to his travel schedule; says Putin pulled a muscle in his back in early September but is not suffering continuing ill effects from incident.
lead_paragraph: President Vladimir V. Putin’s press secretary said that Mr. Putin had been working from home lately rather than commuting to the Kremlin to avoid causing traffic congestion.

headline.seo: Scheduling Changes Prompt Questions About Vladimir V. Putin’s Health
headline.main: Scheduling Changes Prompt Questions About Putin’s Health
headline.print_headline: Putin’s Health Is Scrutinized After Shifts In Schedule
